japanese: 全くもう……/言い出したら聞かないんだから。
english: Really…  /once they say something, they won't listen.

japanese: 力持ち/素直な心/大食い
english: Strong  /Honest heart /Big eater

japanese: 内心ホッとする/今日は我慢したら/それは残念ね
english: Relieved inside /If endure today  /That's unfortunate

japanese: 判る……俺には判るぞ、恭介！/これは推理物の初歩だ！！
english: I get it… I understand, Kyosuke! /This is basic deduction ! !

japanese: 判る……私には判るわ、恭介！/これは推理物の初歩よ！！
english: I get it… I understand, Kyosuke! /This is basic deduction ! !

japanese: 先生、瓦割りは得意なんですか？
english: Sensei, are you good at tile breaking?

japanese: 写真を撮りに来た/ほめに来た/笑いに来た
english: Came for photos /Came to praise /Came to laugh

japanese: 全く……忌野一族と/ジャスティス学園生徒会に刃向かおうとは、/身の程知らずが……
english: Really… to oppose the Inuya clan and /Justice Academy council, /how presumptuous ...

japanese: 内心ホッとする/今日は我慢しろ/それは残念だな
english: Relieved inside /Endure today /That's unfortunate

japanese: 化学部部室に止まった
english: Stopped at Chemistry Club

japanese: 十分だよ。/見てて！
english: That's enough.  /Watch !

japanese: 先生も大変ですねぇ。
english: Sensei has it tough too.

japanese: 先生……顔真っ赤。
english: Sensei… face is red.

japanese: 先生、今日は肩あてが輝いていますね。
english: Sensei, your shoulder pads shine today.

japanese: 全部売るまで、/教室に帰っちゃダメよ！
english: Don't go back to class  /until all sold!

japanese: 助太刀する/警察が来たと叫ぶ/隠れておく
english: Help out  /Shout police are coming  /Hide

japanese: 化学部部室へようこそ。/ここでは、僕の人体実験が受けられるぞ。
english: Welcome to Chemistry Club.  /Here you can receive my experiment.

japanese: 分析タイム……
english: Analysis time...

japanese: 別の……目標？
english: Another... goal?

japanese: 勇気？
english: Courage?

japanese: 先生が描かれた水墨画をね、/美術部の展示用に借りようと思って/見せてもらってたの。
english: I was looking at sensei's ink painting, /thinking to borrow for art club display.

japanese: 全く……/仮眠をとる事もできないな、/この学校では……
english: Really…  /can't even take a nap, /at this school ...

japanese: 判った、用はそれだけだ。/手間をとらせたな、!0。
english: Understood, that's all. /Sorry for trouble,  !0.

japanese: 去年の、あの騒ぎの後で/仲直りしたんでしょ？/だったら別に変じゃないわよ。
english: After last year's incident, /you made up, right?  /Then it's not strange.
